section.heading: Tribunal and support enforcement agency of the District.

para.text: The Family Division of the Superior Court of the District of Columbia is the tribunal of the District.
The Office of the Attorney General is the support enforcement agency of the District.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 103 of Uniform Interstate Family Support Emergency Act of 2015 (D.C. Act 21-215, Nov. 30, 2015, 62 DCR 15616).
